DataElement.preferredName: Tobacco Adolescent Past Month Smoking Quantity Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Use of tobacco (specifically, the number of days in the past 30 days) in any form i.e. smoking, chewing or sniffing._A juvenile between the onset of puberty and maturity; in the state of development between puberty and maturity.  (NCI)_Before the present time._One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks. (NCI)_How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number._The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe._Free text to enter numeric value.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tobacco Adolescent Past Month Smoking Quantity
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Use of tobacco (specifically, the number of days in the past 30 days) in any form i.e. smoking, chewing or sniffing._A juvenile between the onset of puberty and maturity; in the state of development between puberty and maturity.  (NCI)_Before the present time._One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks. (NCI)_How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number._The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Use of tobacco in any form i.e. smoking, chewing or sniffing.

Concepts.definition: Use of tobacco in any form i.e. smoking, chewing or sniffing.

Property.preferredDefinition: A juvenile between the onset of puberty and maturity; in the state of development between puberty and maturity.:Past; before the present time.:One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.:The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe.:How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.

Concepts.definition: An age group comprised of juveniles between the onset of puberty and maturity; in the state of development between puberty and maturity.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.
The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe.
How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from caBIG to PhenX for PANH by script 2015-12-21

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Free text to enter numeric value.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
